column5: Well it seems that we have just surpassed 4,000 registered members.. in honour of this occasion, I'm going to send a hat and t-shirt to crabbs who was the 4,000 registrant.  All crabbs has to do is introduce himself!!

Hi there, my name is crabbs. Im from a small town down east. We goes far to catch our crabbs ya know. Please forward the hat to me brudder misfish,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,, LOL    Hope he comes aboard TJ and CONGRATS on the mile stone and the offer.
that is aweosme!  I think i have been here for 5+ years not sure, does that include from the old boards as well or jsut hte new format?  Congrats OFC  Cheers!
I have been here for about 5 years myself  the info gathered here is priceless  i read the posts daily  ... thx to all that post ...keep it going ....
Congradulations. Thats amazing. Some of the other sites I go to have the following number of members, 714, 855 and 947. So 4000 is quite a lot.  Maybe I shouldn't have lurked for so long.
Maybe the clippers came by and crabbs is no longer.  ps...telling the girlfriend they are from the hotel doesn't usually work.
that was great Brian, thanks for the laugh
Don't want to rain on your parade Bossman, but 83 members online is only slightly more than 2 %... how can we get more members online at one time?  ... maybe it's time to clean out the dead files?
Dead files are cleaned out regularly.

Yeah, but regularly could be as seldom as once a century if we're talkin' milleniums! (just as short time nfor you bubba roy...)   It's just seems like there'd be more than 2-3% of the members online at peak times to me though though.

ahemm   it's me crabbs  Wow thats really cool whos says being last it never good!! I am a member of a few boards and I just joined this one as it looks truly awesome.  My first favourite is hunting..then icefishing then finally soft water fishing.  I am from Oshawa  I have a hunting camp called crabbs camp.  No I don't have crabbs and never had that or any other std ..yuck.  I have a beautiful wife and 3 lovely daughters which I am very proud of so watch your your self or I'll kick your ass    I can give it pretty good so a little class is always welcome but if your in a race to the bottom please just pass on by and keep going on your choosen path.  I got the nick name frome my girls because I can get crabby at times but the scripts seem to be working and generally speaking I am a pretty good guy    I live for the great out doors and make no apoligies for that.  I enjoy meeting new people who like me always give a little more than they recieve.  Hope to be here for a while and look forward to joining the community....hows that...can I have my shirt and hat now..    lol
You fergit that some of these good folks has got real jobs. They cain't all waste away the days lolligaggin' nekkid on the lake like y'all do.  JF
